topic.title: Did you know that?
topic.body: The zeroid.bit site will **record your IP address** when you register with zeroid.bit.

topic.title: ZeroNet is useless
topic.body:
ZeroNet is useless, it does not have DHT functionality, and connections between users need to rely on public IP.

ZeroNet is just a demo of the decentralized network.

topic.title: ZeroNet update work is not doing well
topic.body: The installation package downloaded from zeronet.io is not the latest version.

1549642501_17Dvd3j3RtTZ8z5xqUDVuc9LqNFVH.body:
> [grandphil](#comment_3_1DoWuJgxohLZ3Ctbm5U6mZ2r7RF3UCYc8S): Are you sure? The version you download on zeronet.io is 0.6.4 which is the latest release.

You are wrong, the latest version is 0.6.5 (rev3844).
